skills.name: html5 - (Hypertext Markup Language)

skills.name: css3 - (Cascading Style Sheets)

skills.name: flex box
skills.description: CSS Flexible Box Layout, commonly known as Flexbox, is a CSS web layout model.

skills.name: css Grid

skills.name: sass
skills.description: Sass is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets.

skills.name: bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.

skills.name: java script (js)
skills.description: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language and core technology of the Web, alongside HTML and CSS.

skills.name: power BI

skills.name: photoShop

skills.name: excel

skills.name: maxwell

skills.name: Digsilent
